entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using PersistedAssemblyBuilder, TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride() throws NotSupportedException #102694
  • Unable to use HttpClient configured with UseDefaultCredentials true when the process is running under a restricted token with restricted SIDs #102692
  • `LibraryImport` do not copy `this` #102690
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder writes corrupt metadata tokens to IL stream for arrays of newly-declared types #102687
  • .dbg in ilcompiler package #102684
  • [API Proposal]: New overloads for named wait handles that enable creating/opening user-specific synchronization primitives #102682
    9.0.0

Closed

  • CoreCLR doesn't boot on a "modern" Linux/ARM image #10728
  • Reduce potential false sharing for static fields (sync objects) #102675

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix WhiteSpace validation in HttpHeaders #102693
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Http2Connection throws misleading exceptions on ping timeouts #102691
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Correct NullabilityInfo for indexer parameters in certain circumstances #102686
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Implement `Console.Beep` via bell character instead of Windows API #102685
    area-System.Console, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport 1ES templates #102681
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader #99998
    blocked, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Add ActivitySource Tags #102678
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.0
  • 2nd call to MemoryCache.Set() with the same key same size erases entry if cache is full #102420
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.StoreNarrowing() #102605
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Fix 2 issues when triggering a garbage collection via EventPipe #102612
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #102416
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #102565
    os-android, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Update SDK to 9.0 preview 4 #102604
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SVE: Added `Load2xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load3xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load4xVectorAndUnzip` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Periodically flush when using PipeWriter in Json #102541
    area-System.Text.Json

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Info produced by `dotnet -?` about `dotnet help` is inaccurate. It says the command "Show command line help" rather than show online documentation in browser #41173

PullRequests

Updated

  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds fingerprinting support for assets #41092
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: MSBuildWorkspace can't open .proj file #73707
  • SymbolFinder.FindReferencesAsync not returning references used as base constructor #73704

Closed

  • `IDE0010: Populate Switch` gives up with simple `or` pattern match #73245
    Backlog
  • SymbolFinder.FindReferencesAsync not returning references used as base constructor #73705

PullRequests

Created

  • All tagger work #73718
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce lots of allocations in TagSpanIntervalTree #73715
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache the getnode/gettoken classifiers retrieived from the extension manager. #73712
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not serialize ProjectId.DebugName (in release builds) #73710
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Seeing what breaks #73709
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: allow `cw` snippet in void-returning lambdas #73706
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Don't push non-intersecting nodes/tokens to the classification stack #73717
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move over to IDE using TagSpan uniformly #73713
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move interval trees over to being TextSpan based #73714
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pool collections during tagging. #73708
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not suppress the warning, which doesn't need to be suppressed #73711
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce size of interval tree used for tagging #73703
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for or-pattern in `IDE0010` #73574
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Convert interval-tree type to a struct #73676
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update tagging to avoid jumping back to the UI thread when finished. #73699
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Modify (Large/Source)Text.ParseLineStart to specify an initial capacity for line count #73701
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • On-the-fly-docs content exclusion #73702
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size regression: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #55886
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #55885
  • [9.0-preview.4] Remove default tag with the assembly name from OpenAPI document #55884
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi generate scheme doc Error when minimalapi endpoint return `ValidationProblem` #55883
  • Smarter IResponse content types #55882
  • Exception during HTTP request using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect.OpenIdConnectHandler #55881
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55880
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #55879

Closed

  • [BlazorApp] StateHasChanged doesn't work in System.Threading.Timers / System.Timers / Thread.. callback #55887
  • Perf regression: mapaction #55872
  • Perf improvement: https, updates #55878
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #55871

PullRequests

Created

  • Allowing for the content type/encoding to be specified for the main Result types #55888
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Move Weather page to the Blazor Web Client project when using WebAssembly-based interactivity #55877
    area-blazor

Updated

  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6
  • Fixing minimal api header array binding #55803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun

PullRequests

Updated

  • Use managed identity for blob upload of release assets #4680

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] CollectionView HeightRequest Editor dynamic sizing is broken #22651
  • Flyout shown for a moment when interacting with a backbutton in Android Shell #22649
  • [iOS] Work through how iOS propagates SetNeedsLayout #22647
    9.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Remove workaround for label text decorations #22650
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf

Updated

  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • IllegalArgumentException when changing number of tabbar pages - fix #22589
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Let AddSqlServer/AddSqlite easy to configure the options from provider #33813
  • Issue: TransactionScope Error - "The current TransactionScope is already complete. You should dispose the TransactionScope." #33812

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement nullability computation for `SqlFunctionExpression` #33814
  • Support `AddSqlServer` with DbContextOptionsBuilder with serviceProvider #33811

Updated

  • Fix comparison of nullable values #33757
  • Skip Sqlite functional tests on MacOs #33809
